mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM recenttoon, eachep, toon, member WHERE toon.writerId = member.username AND eachep.toonNum = toon.toonNum AND recenttoon.epNum = eachep.epNum AND recenttoon.username =#{memberVO.username} ORDER BY recenttoon.viewDate DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM favoritetoon, toon, member WHERE toon.writerId = member.username AND favoritetoon.toonNum = toon.toonNum AND favoritetoon.likeClick='1' AND favoritetoon.username=#{memberVO.username} ORDER BY favoritetoon.likeDate DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM useticket, eachep ,toon, member WHERE useticket.epNum = eachep.epNum AND eachep.toonNum = toon .toonNum AND toon.WriterID = member.username AND useticket.username =#{memberVO.username} ORDER BY useticket.utDate DESC
